title: VR-Based Ecological Dynamics Theory Program for Enhancing Sports Performance

context.prior_knowledge: Basic sports science knowledge and VR technology experience
context.additional_context: Strengthening real-world decision-making skills through digital device-based personalized sports training environments and ecological dynamics theory application.

learning_goals: Learners can design and execute personalized training scenarios using a VR system.
Learners enhance real-time decision-making skills in response to environmental changes based on ecological dynamics theory.
Learners develop and apply creative problem-solving strategies while exploring diverse virtual environments.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
